mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, BIRTH, ADDRESS) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{memberPwd}, #{memberName}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{birth}, #{address})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET EMAIL = #{email}, ADDRESS = #{address}, PHONE = #{phone} WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, BIRTH, ADDRESS, STATUS) VALUES (#{memberId}, 1234, #{memberName}, #{email}, #{phone}, SYSDATE, '역삼', #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.EMAIL, M.PHONE, M.BIRTH, M.ADDRESS, M.STATUS, M.P_IMG, P.PAY_PRODUCT, TO_CHAR(P.PAY_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS PAY_TIME FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN PAYMENT P ON M.MEMBER_ID = P.MEMBER_ID WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY P.PAY_TIME DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
